page.title: 18SCHOOLS IN CIPPENHAM
page.content: The Cippenham area has one middle,two first and two playgroups.Cippenham First is the only school to share land with another.It has four classrooms and a library with 1150 books for 164 children. Western House,the other first school has a built in nursery and has six classrooms.It also has three cloakrooms and toilets for each.It has a hard playing area at the front and grass at the back. The nursery has toys inside,swings,slides and climbing frames outside and also used to have a sandpit. Cippenham First's nursery is in the grounds of the first school.It is a Terrapin Hut with a wide range of outside equipment. Cippenham Middle school has a large playing field and 334 pupils. There are 16 members of staff.It also has a swimming_pool and a hard playing area.
